price: Y así es como hago que los injustos sean unos aliados de otros.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
